search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for RegFox (regfox.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for RegFox can be accessed at the following URL: [https://www.regfox.com/pricing](https://www.regfox.com/pricing)【3:1†source】.

citations.title: Best Low Cost Event Registration System | RegFox

extracted_content.content:
[](https://www.regfox.com/)

[![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/63121f4366eb3236863fe009_regfox%20logo.svg)](https://www.regfox.com/)

Crystal Clear Pricing and No Hidden Fees
----------------------------------------

Don't settle for the upfront costs, licensing fees, and pricing shenanigans of Eventbrite, Cvent, and Bizzabo.

RegFox is a flat 99¢ + 1% fee per paid registrant for paid events. Fees are capped at $4.99 per registrant. If you are only hosting free, our pricing is just $0.99 per registrant.

![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/66046c07b6a0ce2406d66554_regfox-pricing%20(1).webp)

Go Ahead, Compare Us To The Other Guys
--------------------------------------

##### RegFox's pricing is only 99¢ + 1% per paid registrant with zero upfront costs.

*   Average Entry Fee$
    
    $
    
*   Attendees Per Event
*   Events Per Year

Total savings

$0

/ year

or

$0

every 5 years

Calculator based RegFox fees at 99¢ + 1% per registrant + standard credit card processing rates.

RegFox cost per year is **$1,790** saving you 110%

### Savvy Event Organizers Use RegFox

Don't take our word for it. Here are real reviews about the way RegFox rocks the house.

"RegFox is hands down the easiest and most user-friendly event management/registration tool on the market. The whole process from start to finish was one of the easier I've ever used, and I am a past Cvent and Eventbrite user."

**\- Diana G, from g2.com**

“So easy to set up new events, incredibly intuitive interface on both internal and customer-facing sides, feature-rich, great dashboard data, drag and drop layout.”

\- Pete M, from g2.com

"Setting up the events was easy. The site is intuitive. But the best part is the outstanding customer service and tech support! The team is quick to respond to any questions I have had.  Not having to pay a yearly fee upfront was also a huge plus!"

\- Shannon M, from g2.com

“What first struck me about RegFox was the ease in building a beautiful registration page. I wanted pages that had the same feeling as my website - friendly, aesthetically pleasing, AND that I could build myself.”

\- Sharon S, from g2.com

“My organization had their first virtual conference  with the support of RegFox and it was a wonderful virtual event. The registration page, confirmation letter, and reminders were highly professional and easy to set up. The support from RegFox was amazing and they were very affordable.

\- Jane W, from g2.com

“RegFox has been a great switch for us and I love the way we can make attractive events with less fees to registrants. They continue to add new features and are very easy to reach for support."

\- Stacy D from Capterra

Simple Pricing and No Licensing Fees
------------------------------------

### RegFox costs just 99¢ + 1% per paid registrant + standard credit card processing rates

Fees are capped at $4.99 per registrant  
(unlike Eventbrite and others who have no max fee).

RegFox is the most affordable registration platform
---------------------------------------------------

Look at all you get for just 99¢ + 1% per paid registrant. No setup or annual fees, no surprises, no shenanigans.

Standard credit card processing rates are 2.9% + 30¢ per paid registration.

![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/623b4c4b1c5f97404da44a50_pricing-shape.webp)

**Optional Upgrades  
**
------------------------

![Image 4: Paper plane Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/623b4edc692b0553b63676ff_paper-plane.svg)

Email Marketing Automation
--------------------------

Marketing email automations for you create drip campaigns to campaigns to your past attendees or your email database.

### $9 / Month

\+ 2¢ / per Recipient

There is no fee for confirmation emails to registrants.

![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/65ca0fe9b931cdebe3b76889_phone.svg)

Text Message Platform
---------------------

Create and send mass text messages for sales, promotions, event updates, surveys and more from your own dedicated text message number.

### $19 / Month

\+ 4¢ / Per recipient

Carrier activation fee applies and subject to carrier approval.

![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/65ca01c5726ace3087e07e6f_stats.svg)

3rd Party Data Enrichment
-------------------------

Get invaluable insights about your registrants including interests, demographics, buying patterns, and household data.

### $9 / Month

\+ 10¢ / Per record

Only pay for contacts and registrants that are enriched.

![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/65ca026741307db45dcddd09_phone.svg)

Cashless On-Site Payments
-------------------------

Enable Mobile PayPass which allows your registrants to pay for anything on site simply with their registration QR code that is linked to their card on file.

\+ 25¢  / Per Transactionth

Sell any products, food or beverage on site with companion mobile POS app.

![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/65ca0267d82771e109bfc827_pencil.svg)

White Label Domain Name
-----------------------

Host all your registration pages on your own custom domain name and mask out RegFox's domain for a nearly white label experience.

### $150

per year

Online registration pages hosted on a subdomain of your primary domain name.

![Image 9: Credit card icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/623b51a88bf418ca6ef48428_card-svg.svg)

3rd Party Payment Processing
----------------------------

If you can't use our default payment processor or preferred partners you can use your existing payment gateway for a 1% fee.

### 1%

Fee

We currently support Authorize.net, Stripe, NMI, Paya, and Cybersource. Call for compatibility.

Easy to use, highly customizable, unbelievably affordable
---------------------------------------------------------

![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/627be866afc4b2397bd668a8_fee-control.svg)

Convenience fee control & markup

Decide if you want to have a convenience fee on your page. If so, you set and keep 100% of it.

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/627be866ee29f344caebb89d_product-sales.svg)

Merchandise & product sales

Upsell your buyers on event swag, accessories, gear and merch.

![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/627be866fe9d756b66b46984_Social%20incentives.svg)

Social incentives

Reward buyers with discounts and incentives when they share your page.

![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/627be866ac98543fd55a3cfd_Edit%20%26%20upgrade.svg)

Edit & upgrade

Effortlessly upgrade an existing order and upcharge buyers automatically in one step.

![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/627be8661499dd1b5924ea4f_Deposit%20payments.svg)

Deposit payments

Capture deposit payments and final balances automatically with card on file.

![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/627be8659542cec02ba48c0b_Capture%20donations.svg)

Capture donations

Raise money for a great cause right from your registration page.

### Get started today. Pay as you go.  
Cancel whenever.

![Image 16: User Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/62331bd32dc21d43f8985b56_icon-user.svg)

Create A Free Account

**No membership fees or contracts. No hidden fees, surprises, or shenanigans.**

![Image 17: App Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/62331c15e4172b4b360f3f81_icon-app.svg)

Customize Your Page

**RegFox offer's simple tools without the need for technical knowledge. You can totally do it.**

![Image 18: Celebrate Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6230898a577f44022cbc37f0/62331c1fa2bedea3139c5df9_icon-celebrate.svg)

Celebrate!

**When your event goes live and the registrations start pouring in.**

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

What is RegFox’s pricing?

RegFox pricing is simple. Just 99¢ + 1% per paid registration (that you can pass on to your attendees.)

Do you have platform, setup, licensing, annual, or support fees?

Nope, nada, zilch.

Are there credit card transaction fees?

Yes. Like every payment taken online nowadays, RegFox has standard credit card processing fees of 2.9% + 30¢.

Is there a cap on the fees?

Yes. Even for the most expensive event, fees are capped at $4.99 per registrant. Take that, Eventbrite.

Are there any fees for free events?

If you’ve run previously paid events with RegFox, free events are absolutely free.

Is your pricing “per attendee”?

Yes, RegFox is just a flat 99¢ + 1% fee per paid registrant plus standard credit card processing rates of 2.9% + 30¢.

How do I get paid?

Once you've created a page you will need to set up a Payment Processor that connects to your account and allows you to receive payments for your events. [Click here](https://help.regfox.com/en/articles/5386956-how-do-i-get-paid) for more information and how to get paid.

How often can I get paid with RegFox?

Weekly! Unlike many other event registration companies who make you wait until after your event to get paid, we offer weekly payouts directly to your bank account.

What payment processors can I use?

Most customers use our in-house processor, Webconnex Payments. But you’re also welcome to use Stripe, Authorize.net, NMI, Paya, Cybersource, Payflow Pro, and SecureNet. [Learn more about all the processors and fees here](https://help.regfox.com/en/articles/2347334-compatible-gateways).

RegFox is the best low cost event management system. Simple, low cost pricing. Forget overpriced registration software providers like Cvent, Hopin, and Bizzaboo

pricing_data.pricing_notes: RegFox offers a straightforward pricing model based on per registrant fees with optional upgrades.

additional_fees.fee_description: Standard credit card processing rates of 2.9% + 30¢ per transaction.
Applies to text message platform usage.
